title: Warped Mirror
description:
Description :
        Nogawa is called over to a meetup with her group of high school friends for the first time in years. However, one face among them brings about great ire within Nogawa - a certain Sawamoto, the first of their friend group to get married. During the course of their meetup, Nogawa reflects on what about Sawamoto sets her off...In addition to the title story, also includes:- **Ms. Ruiko's Glasses** (ルイ子さんのメガネ, Ruiko-san no Megane) - *Mimi*, January 1980- **The Fig Tree** (無花果の木, Ichijiku no Ki) - *Deluxe Bonita*, March-April 1982.- **Winter Journey** (冬の旅, Fuyu no Tabi) - *Deluxe Bonita*, May 1983- **My Private Dream, The Night I met Joni Mitchell** (ジョニ・ミッチェルに会った夜の私的な夢, Joni Mitchell ni Atta Yoru no Shiteki na Yume) - *Bonita Eve*, July 1983

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: My Private Dream, The Night I Met Joni Mitchell
